author: liyin
msg: I am modifying this since I think it would be more useful to
have a constructor which sets the percentile and number of buckets
during initialization, since that is set just one time and not changed.
Let me know if you think this change is not necessary
Test Plan: ran HistogramTest unit test

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-5032][89-fb] Disable the write of Delete Column Bloom Filter
The Delete Column Bloom filter write was enabled by default,
adding a parameter, so we can enable/disable it in the future
Reviewers: liyintang, aaiyer, rshroff, manukranthk, shaneh

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-8114][89-fb] Interrupt the RS RPC call when the client connection has been closed
Summary: when the socket connection is closed we are interrupting the current call. Also, we don't want to interrupt the prefatch call just the actual get/next.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-5263] Change the logging to trace in HFileWriterV2 for cacheCurrentBlockForCompaction
The logging level is debug by default on all the HBase clusters. The current
function cacheCurrentBlockForCompaction dumps the log at debug level for every
Changing the level to trace to avoid spamming the log.
Test Plan: build and test it on TSH25

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-8328] Making the regex for the hostname in HServerInfo more strict
Summary: The regex for the servername in HServerInfo was very liberal. Making it more strict by ensuring that the hostname follows the Letters-Digits-Hyphen (LDH) rule.
2. Checked that the regex accepts hostnames like {"123.223.444.111", "hbaseproxy001.prn1.fb.com" }, and does not accept hostnames like { "", " ", "  ", "#123$!!"}
